name: iceberg-zk-circuits
description: Zero-knowledge circuits for anonymous swap protocol

scripts.install-circom: curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh && cargo install --git https://github.com/iden3/circom.git circom
scripts.setup: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 pot12_0000.ptau && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name='First contribution' -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau -v
scripts.build-zkey: snarkjs groth16 setup withdraw.r1cs pot12_final.ptau withdraw_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute withdraw_0000.zkey withdraw_0001.zkey --name='1st Contributor' -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey withdraw_0001.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.build-all: npm run compile && npm run setup && npm run build-zkey && npm run generate-verifier
